name: ax-sep
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0
body: |- wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0))))
comment: The Axiom of Separation of ZF set theory. See ~ axsep for more information. It was derived as ~ axsep above and is therefore redundant, but we state it as a separate axiom here so that its uses can be identified more easily. (Contributed by NM, 11-Sep-2006.)
